alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 2:49AM MDT until July 19 at 3:15AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TODD AND SOUTHEASTERN MELLETTE COUNTIES... At 349 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Butte Creek, or 14 miles east of White River, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mission, White River, Okreek, Wood, Mosher, Soldier Creek, Butte Creek, Swift Bear, Ring Thunder, Antelope, Horse Creek, Haystack Butte and northeastern Rosebud Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
